name: NodeTool
description: Finds or Downloads and caches specified version spec of Node and adds it to the PATH.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: versionSpec
inputs.label: Version Spec
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version Spec of version to get.  Examples: 6.x, 4.x, 6.10.0, >=6.10.0

inputs.name: ltsOnly
inputs.label: LTS Only
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies whether the version resolution will filter to LTS only versions.
